title: Pacers Offer A(y) Ton
description:
Mina Kimes and Frank Isola discuss if the Suns should match the Pacer’s 133 million dollar offer sheet for Deandre Ayton, if it is time to take the Oriels and Mariners seriously and if it would be risky for the 49ers to trade Jimmy G inside their division.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The Pacers offer Deandre Ayton 133 Million and is it time to take the Oriels and Mariners seriously?
